column3: it's like this and like that and like this i'm the illest rapper to hold the cordless patrollin' corners lookin' for hookers to punch in the mouth with a roll of quarters i'm meaner in action than roscoe beatin' james todd senior and smackin' his back with vacuum cleaner attachments i grew up in a wild hood as a hazardous youth with a fucked up childhood that i used as an excuse and ain't shit changed i kept the same mind state since the third time that i failed ninth grade you probably think that i'm a negative person don't be so sure of it i don't promote violence i just encourage it i laugh at the sight of death as i fall down a cement flight of steps and land inside a bed of spider webs so throw caution to the wind you and a friend can jump off of a  and if you live do it again shit why not blow your brain out i'm blowin' mine out fuck it you only live once you might as well die now
